_sText:
*********************!!!!!**********************

EDIT #2: Here is the more optimized version of the map (##### thanks to GRUDGE): --> [zm_towers_redux_v1_final](http://www.mediafire.com/?6sh0mhspw9vby9u "zm_towers_redux_v1_final"). <-- FPS is steady and the game play is smooth. This will be the final version of this redux. Hope you guys enjoy it and thanks for the support.

*********************!!!!!**********************
*********************!!!!!**********************
*********************!!!!!**********************

EDIT #1: Working on a better and more optimized version. It seems that 64+ player servers will experience FPS lag when on the tower. New version will be uploaded when it is fully tested on a 64 man server.

Changelog:
+ Removed a lot of the railing brushwork which was causing fps lag.
+ Broke up func_detail brush work so it wasn't one huge func_detail.
+ Added a lot of hint/skip and removed some unnecessary areaportals.
+ Removed some excessive lighting.

Original Post: I love the classic zm_towers but I decided it needed a face lift and this is the result. Please let me know your thoughts! :) Thanks!
